headline: Gold Price Rises. Watch This Level for a Floor.
summary: The price of the most actively-traded bullion contract appears to have steadied in recent days, at about $4,000 an ounce.

headline: Ghana initiates largest mining sector audit in a decade
summary: The process will be conducted by government auditors, forensic accountants and independent consultants.

headline: Is Newmont (NEM) One of the Best NYSE Stocks to Buy and Hold for the Next Decade?
summary: Newmont Corporation (NYSE:NEM) is one of the best NYSE stocks to buy and hold for the next decade. On October 27, TD Cowen analyst Steven Green maintained a Hold rating on Newmont Mining and set a price target of $89.00. Furthermore, on October 24, Raymond James analyst Brian MacArthur raised the firm’s price target on […]

headline: Are Wall Street Analysts Bullish on Newmont Stock?
summary: Mining giant Newmont has significantly outperformed the broader market over the past year, and analysts remain strongly bullish on the stock’s prospects.
